messages.title: A PERSONAL MESSAGE FOR YOU
messages.content: This election is the most important for a generation. It is not only a decision about who we want as Prime Minister, but also who we want as our local MP. A Minister who works at a local, regional and national level. Even though you may not have considered voting Conservative before, I hope you will consider voting for me.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Secure economic recovery to create more jobs for local people.
Make sure work pays by delivering tax cuts for low and middle earners and fighting for a local living wage.
Campaign for a 'National Convention' on the future of the health service to take politics out of the NHS.
Establish a community college to provide opportunities and skills for young people, offering a real alternative to university.
Fight for more investment for our roads and infrastructure and ensure we get our fair share from Central Council.
Provide the imagination, energy and commitment we expect from our MP.

issues.economy: Income tax cut for 30m people, Benefits capped, The deficit eliminated, Strong and stable leadership
issues.education: Establish a community college to provide opportunities and skills for young people
issues.environment: Fight for more investment for our roads and infrastructure
issues.health: Campaign for a 'National Convention' on the future of the health service to take politics out of the NHS.

leaflet.personalStatement: This election is the most important for a generation. It is not only a decision about who we want as Prime Minister, but also who we want as our local MP.

images.caption: Glenn Hall with family and supporters
